HomePage.BannerText1: ROX CORP. has been engaged in the automobile spare parts business since 1976 and has proven itself to be one of the best in Taiwan in this industry.
HomePage.BannerText3: Sourcing all over Taiwan, building up strong relationship with factories, exporting high dependable quality products worldwide, we ROX CORP.is a experienced and reliable partner in your Auto Parts Business

ContactBox.Title: We provides Auto Parts from Taiwan manufacturers
ContactBox.Text: Please feel free to contact us for more information.

BrandsBox.BrandsTitle: We supply all brands of Taiwan manufacturers
BrandsBox.BrandsText: We provides auto parts from manufacturers all over Taiwan , please feel free to contact us for more details.
BrandsBox.Taiwan: Sourcing all specific branded parts for our customers

About.AboutText1: We continuously endeavor to source wide range of high quality Automotive Parts, providing fair price and ultimate benefits to the customers through value creation and mutual trust.
About.AboutText2: Constantly supplying automobile spare parts to countries in Latin American, Europe, Middle East and South East Asia market, and participating in overseas exhibitions to meet customers for better communication.
About.AboutBoxText1: We guarantee supplying auto parts which are 100% made in Taiwan.
About.AboutBoxText2: Our auto parts are all manufactured under strict standards that enable high performance and durability.
About.AboutBoxText3: With more than 45 years of experiences, our good relationship with the top manufacturers that has allowed us to provide comprehensive auto parts and competitive prices.
About.AboutBoxText4: We believe that trusting relationships are built through sincerity, honesty and communication. Customers’ feedback will always be our working guideline.

ContactPage.ContactBannerText: Looking for better source of spare parts?
ContactPage.ContactSubTitle: Auto Parts for Wholesalers or Importers
ContactPage.ContactText1: Please fill out the following form  with your detailed contact information and brief message. For more efficient service, we require:
ContactPage.ContactText2: - Inquiry please indicate purchase Quantity and OEM numbers or Factories’ numbers of parts
ContactPage.ContactText3: - Indication of preferable brands of Taiwan are necessary.

BrandsPage.SASAKIText: Specialised in switches manufacturing. The brand mainly develops, produces and sells automobile switches for steering system, door system, ignition system, and lighting system. We also provides sensors and other electronic components for automotive industry.
BrandsPage.TOKAIText: Providing high-quality hydraulic Brake & Clutch Cyl. Assy. & Repair Kits ,Engine Timing kit parts and Oil seals. For more than 2 decades, products manufacture based upon the JIS standard and OEM specification, insisted on all vital parts are 100% made in Taiwan to enable dependable and constant high performance.
BrandsPage.NISHIOKAText: Dealing in suspensions, steering and other key parts that impact automotive performance. Following OEM standard in all manufacturing process. A prefered brand of replacement chassis parts by professional technicians. we can also accommodate small-lot orders.

ProductsPage.BannerText: We supply all renowned brand names of auto spare parts from top manufacturers of Taiwan.
